content.College Info: SSN College of Engineering, established in 1996 by philanthropist Dr. Shiv Nadar, is a premier NAAC A++ and AICTE-approved institution consistently ranked among the top engineering colleges in India, offering world-class undergraduate and postgraduate programs across diverse disciplines, guided by highly qualified faculty with strong academic, research, and industry expertise, fostering a vibrant culture of research, innovation, and entrepreneurship through well-funded projects, state-of-the-art laboratories, and incubation support, equipped with modern infrastructure including smart classrooms, high-speed internet, and one of Tamil Nadu’s largest private libraries, while providing a lively campus life enriched with technical clubs, cultural fests, sports, and hackathons, ensuring excellent placement opportunities with leading global recruiters such as Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Infosys, and TCS, supporting students with merit-based scholarships, financial aid, and personalized mentorship, and strategically located on Chennai’s Old Mahabalipuram Road (IT corridor) offering unparalleled industry connectivity and career prospects.
content.Courses:
Courses Offered

  • Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) - Computer Science

    Duration: 4 years | Seats: 120

  • Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.) - Electronics and Communication

    Duration: 4 years | Seats: 120

  • Master of Business Administration (MBA)

    Duration: 2 years | Seats: 60
content.Fees:
Fee Structure

Undergraduate Programs

Tuition Fee: $18,000 per year

Hostel & Mess Fee: $2,500 per year

Postgraduate Programs

Total Program Fee: $25,000
